title: How to display 'Date & Time' in Grub2/BURG

forumNotes.author: pokemon1
forumNotes.content:
Hi, how can I enable date \& time display in GRUB2/BURG boot console. I am aware of a modules 'date.mod' \& 'time.mod' that can be invoked to display date and time respectively in terminal console by putting 'date' or 'time' commands, but not sure how to call that through UI?  

Regards
